actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.

official_title: A resolution to amend the Senate rules concerning the reading of the Journal.

summary.text: Revises the Standing Rules of the Senate to provide that upon motion and agreement thereto, the journal of the preceding day shall be read (previously the reading of the journal was required). Provides that such a motion shall be privileged and shall be decided without debate.

titles.title: A resolution to amend the Senate rules concerning the reading of the Journal.
